greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer partitions of n whose length is equal to the LCM of all parts.
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(nb = 0); forpart(p=n, if (lcm(Vec(p))==#p, nb++);); nb;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 03 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 02 2018
